text: Hi <#C26E7JT8V|ideas> peeps! I have a regular need to do Newsletter Signup forms for website footers; they all look roughly like this:

It's kinda tricky to accomplish with basic HubSpot embedded forms. I think a "Horizontal Mode" would be an awesome addition to Forms and would make this (very useful imo) format very easy to pull off for most marketers

i agree, we had this in out blog template and they made some update to the way it was coded out and it broke the button sitting next to it. (then again whoever css'd it shouldn't have used hs classes but that was awhile ago before my time)
